name: A Foxy ARPG
description:
A small action RPG about a fox and some bats based on the excellent tutorial by HeartBeast:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9FzW-m48fn2SlrW0KoLT4n5egNdX-W9a

Controls are WASD | J to attack | K to roll

Under the menu you can find:

  • Bats Remaining
  • Mute Buttons
  • Fullscreen
  • Touch Controls

Enjoy!
